message.name: ERR_PREFERED_EMAIL_WILL_BE_DELETED
message.locale: A preferred email will be deleted

message.name: ERR_PREFERED_PHONE_WILL_BE_DELETED
message.locale: Telephone Number is marked as the preferred phone number. Are you sure you want to delete this evidence?

message.name: ERR_IDENTIFICATION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The identification type cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PHOENUM_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The phone number has been chosen to receive alerts, please unselect the option, before deleting.

message.name: ERR_ATLEAST_1_RESIDENTIAL_MUST_BE_PRESENT
message.locale: At least one residential address must be present in the system

message.name: ERR_ATLEAST_1_MAILING_MUST_BE_PRESENT
message.locale: At least one mailing address must be present in the system

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_PREFERENCE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: A Contact Preferences record must exist. This record cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_EMAIL_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The email address has been chosen to receive alerts, please unselect the option, before deleting.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_PREFERENCE_COMM_MODIFY
message.locale: Changing the preferred method of correspondence will update the communication method field on all communications for the person where communication status = 'Draft' or 'Submitted' to reflect the new value.

message.name: ERR_MAILING_ADDRESS_FORMAT_INCORRECT
message.locale: The mailing address format is incorrect. Please verify your address details.

message.name: ERR_REF_NUM_MODIFIED
message.locale: The Reference Number Identification cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_BANK_ACCOUNT_CANNOT_DELETE_USED_FOR_PAYMENT
message.locale: The bank account cannot be deleted since payment has been issued to this account. Please consider end dating the record.

message.name: ERR_POSTAL_CODE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Postal Code should be Entered for Address Search.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_SELECT
message.locale: Please select one of the addresses in the list.

message.name: ERR_BANK_ACCOUNT_CANNOT_MODIFY_LINK_EXISTS
message.locale: Bank-Program Link exists for this Bank. Bank information cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ATTESTEE_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Attestee is mandatory when the change reason is 'Reported by Client', 'Reported by Client via Life Event', or 'Reported by External Party'.

message.name: ERR_ATTESTATION_CHECKBOX_MANDATORY
message.locale: Attestee must agree to the attestation when the change reason is 'Reported by Client', 'Reported by Client via Life Event', or 'Reported by External Party'.

message.name: ERR_ATTESTATION_NO_CHANGE
message.locale: The Attestation cannot be modified. Please ensure the Attestation content is changed back to the original content.

message.name: ERR_ATTESTEE_IS_MANDATORY_WHEN_INSERT
message.locale: Attestee is mandatory

message.name: ERR_ATTESTATION_CHECKBOX_MANDATORY_WHEN_INSERT
message.locale: Does the Attestee agree with the attestation? must be specified when creating a new evidence record

message.name: WARNING_ONLY_TAX_CREDIT_EVIDENCE
message.locale: This is the only Active Tax Credit evidence for the person.

message.name: ERR_RESTRICTED_COUNTRY
message.locale: The Address information received from the selected SSA Country must be added at the Foreign Engagement case level.

message.name: ERR_FOREIGN_GOVT_REQUIRED_FIELDS
message.locale: 'Received from Country' and 'Mode of Receipt' must be selected if 'Received From' is selected as 'Foreign Government'.

message.name: ERR_FOREIGN_GOVT_EXCLUSIVE_FIELDS
message.locale: 'Received from Country' and 'Mode of Receipt' must be selected only if 'Received From' is selected as 'Foreign Government'.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_MISMATCH
message.locale: The Residential address does not match the Mailing address.

message.name: ERR_DATE_OF_DEATH_REQUIRED_FOR_OFFENDER_STATUS_DECEASED
message.locale: Date of Death must be entered if Offender Status is 'Deceased'.

message.name: ERR_INCARCERATION_EVIDENCE_OVERLAP
message.locale: An Incarceration record already exists for an overlapping period.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The start date cannot be modified as the deduction has already been applied.

message.name: ERR_NO_ASSOCIATED_ISSUE
message.locale: Evidence record has no associated Issue. Set Resolution value to blank.

message.name: ERR_RESOLVE_ASSOCIATED_ISSUE
message.locale: Evidence record cannot be activated. Resolve associated issue.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_MODIFY_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The 'Start Date' cannot be changed as the Voluntary Tax Withhold deduction has been used in the gross to net payment calculation.To add a withholding for a new period, you must end date this evidence record and create a new VTW evidence record.

message.name: ERR_DOLLAR_AMOUNT_WITHHELD_MODIFY_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The 'Dollar Amount to be Withheld' cannot be changed as the Voluntary Tax Withhold deduction has been processed.To change the 'Dollar Amount to be Withheld' you must create a new VTW evidence record.

message.name: ERR_PERCENTAGE_WITHHELD_MODIFY_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The 'Percentage to be Withheld' cannot be changed as the Voluntary Tax Withhold deduction has been processed.To change the 'Percentage to be Withheld' you must create a new VTW evidence record.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_MODIFY_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The 'End Date' cannot be changed as request to stop deducting the Voluntary Tax Withhold from the client's payment has been used in the gross to net payment calculation.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_VTW_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The evidence cannot be deleted as the Voluntary Tax Withhold deduction has been used in the gross to net payment calculation.

message.name: ERR_EVD_ADDRESS_OVERLAPPING_PERIOD
message.locale: %1s address exists for an overlapping period.

message.name: ERR_BDM_FOREIGN_IDENTIFIER_IDENTIFICATION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as it is associated to an Active Liaison or Foreign Application.
